column2: "Asɛm a ofi EWURADZE nkyɛn baa Jeremia hɔ
column8: Kyerɛw nsɛm a maka makyerɛ wo nyina wɔ nwoma mu."

column2: "Na
column6: medze me man Israel na Juda ndɔmmumfo bɛsan aba
column7: EWURADZE na ɔse: na mama wɔasan asaase a medze memaa hɔn egyanom no do

column2: "Na yinom nye nsɛm a EWURADZE kae wɔ Israel ho na Juda ho."
"Na mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Yɛatse ahopopo ndze
column4: na nnyɛ asomdwee dze bi a."

column2: "Afei hom mbisa na hom nhu kyerɛ dɛ ɔbarimba botum awo ba anaa: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na muhu ɔbarimba biara dɛ ne nsa dze ne sisiw mu dɛ ɔbaa a awoo aka no yi? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na enyim nyinara atotow fitaa yi?"
"Due! Na da no yɛ hu dodow a biara nntse dɛ ɔno: Jakob no fona ber a; naaso wɔbɛgye no nkwa efi mu."
"Na ɔbɛba dɛ da no mu no
column4: mubobubu no kɔndua efi wo kɔn ho
column5: na matsetsew wo nkyehoma no mu; na ananaben nnkedzi no nya bio:"

column2: "na wɔbɔsom EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn
column3: na hɔn hen David a mebɛma no do ama hɔn no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi m'akowaa Jakob
column8: mebɛgye wo nkwa mefi ekyirekyir na w'asefo mefi hɔn ndɔmmumfafo asaase do; na Jakob bɛsan aba

column2: "Na menye wo nam
column4: dɛ mebɛgye wo nkwa: na mebɛma amanaman a mabɔ wo apetse hɔ nyina asa koraa
column6: meremma ennsa koraa; na mbom medze atsɛmbu mebɛtsea wo
column7: na meremma emmfa woho tɔtrɔtɔ ara da."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
"Obi nnyi hɔ a odzi w'asɛm ma wo ayarsadur biara innyi hɔ ma w'epirakur
column3: na ayarsa biara innyi hɔ ma wo."

column2: "W'adɔfo nyinara werɛ efir wo; wɔnnhwehwɛ wo: osiandɛ medze ɔtamfo epirakur mepira wo
column3: medze otsiɔdzennyi ntsea matsea wo; wɔ w'emumuyɛ ne kɛse ntsi
column4: osiandɛ wo bɔn adɔɔ so pii."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na erekeka mu wɔ wo pira ntsi? Wo kur nnyi edur: wɔ w'emumuyɛ ne kɛse ntsi
column3: osiandɛ wo bɔn adɔɔ so ntsi na medze ndzɛmba yinom ayɛ wo."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hɔn a wɔmemen wo nyina wɔbɛmen hɔn; na w'atamfo no nyinara mu obiara bɔkɔ ndɔmmum; na hɔn a wɔsoɛr wo no wɔbɔsoɛr hɔn do; na hɔn a wɔfa wo afo nyinara wɔbɛfa hɔn afo."
"Na mebɛma wo apɔwmudzen bio
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse; osiandɛ wɔafrɛ wo nyia woeyi no tokyen
column6: Zion a obi nnhwehwɛ n'ekyir kwan a."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Hwɛ
column3: medze Jakob ntamadan mu ndɔmmum mebɛsan aba bio
column4: na menya ayamuhyehye wɔ ne tsenabea ho; na wɔbɛkyekyer kurow no wɔ ne ndamfo no ara do
column5: na ahemfi no besi hɔ dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse no ara."

column2: "Na ndaase na hɔn a hɔn enyi agye ndze befir edzi wɔ mu: na mebɛma wɔadɔr
column3: na worunnsuar; mebɛhyɛ hɔn enyimnyam so

column2: "Hɔn mba so bɛyɛ dɛ asɔpɔn no
column3: na hɔn mboanofo betsim wɔ m'enyim
column4: na mebɛtsea hɔn a wɔhaw hɔn no nyinara."

column2: "Na hɔn hen bɛyɛ hɔnankasa hɔn bi
column3: na hɔn hwɛdofo efir hɔn mu; na mebɛma wɔatwe epin me
column4: na wɔbɛbɛn me nkyɛn: na woana nye nyia woesi no bo dɛ ɔbɛbɛn me? EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Na hom bɛyɛ me man
"Hwɛ
column6: ekyinehyia ehum a: obotu abɔ emumuyɛfo etsifi."

column2: "EWURADZE n'ebufuw hyeehyew no rennsan
column4: na ɔama n'akoma mu esusudze aba mu ansaana. Nda a odzi ekyir no mu na hom bɛtse ase."
